explains: adj. 值得尊敬的，体面的；相当好的，不错的；有一定价值的，相当重要的

sentences.en: I have to prove myself as a respectable, balanced person.
sentences.cn: 我得证明自己是一个可敬、沉稳的人。

sentences.en: He came from a perfectly respectable middle-class family.
sentences.cn: 他来自一个非常体面的中产阶级家庭。

sentences.en: The former wild man of rock has reinvented himself as a respectable family man.
sentences.cn: 过去的那位摇滚狂人已经改变形象，成了一位体面的爱家的男人。
